docs.snippet: The candidacy of Donald Trump offers a unique opportunity the party would be foolish to miss....
docs.lead_paragraph: The candidacy of Donald Trump offers a unique opportunity the party would be foolish to miss.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Robert H Frank underscores how Donald Trump's candidacy threatens down-ballot Republican congressional candidates, even in districts that have been gerrymandered by Republicans; observes that flipping many Republican-held districts will require spending in states that typical Democratic presidential campaigns would avoid; urges Hillary Clinton to explicitly make argument for flipping House control when coaxing Democratic donors, particularly in context of staunch Republican opposition to addressing climate change.

headline.main: Take Back the House, Democrats. Please.

docs.snippet: L.G.B.T. rights are playing a fascinating, pivotal role in 2016 elections....
docs.lead_paragraph: L.G.B.T. rights are playing a fascinating, pivotal role in 2016 elections.
docs.abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column examines prominence of LGBT rights in Florida Congressional race between Democrat Stephanie Murphy and Republican incumbent Rep John Mica; says it is example of rising trend, across country, in which advocacy on behalf of LGBT Americans is playing pivotal role in local, state and national elections.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's Christian Democrats were beaten into third place by the anti-immigrant and anti-Islam Alternative for Germany (AfD) party in a north-eastern state election on Sunday, TV exit polls showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's Christian Democrats were beaten into third place by the anti-immigrant and anti-Islam Alternative for Germany (AfD) party in a north-eastern state election on Sunday, TV exit polls showed.

headline.main: German Anti-Immigrant Party Beats Merkel in Her Home District
headline.print_headline: German Anti-Immigrant Party Beats Merkel in Her Home District

docs.snippet: If Hillary Clinton carries Arizona in November, there's a good chance it won't be because Democrats on their own have flipped a reliable GOP state they hope to win consistently someday....
docs.lead_paragraph: If Hillary Clinton carries Arizona in November, there's a good chance it won't be because Democrats on their own have flipped a reliable GOP state they hope to win consistently someday.

headline.main: On Road to 270, Arizona Is Home to Best Chance for a Spoiler
headline.print_headline: On Road to 270, Arizona Is Home to Best Chance for a Spoiler

docs.snippet: The attorney general, Mohammad Farid Hamidi, must contend with a political elite that has seen law enforcement as a net to entangle rivals and make money....
docs.lead_paragraph: The attorney general, Mohammad Farid Hamidi, must contend with a political elite that has seen law enforcement as a net to entangle rivals and make money.
docs.abstract: Profile of Mohammad Farid Hamidi, Afghanistan's new attorney general, who faces challenge of delivering justice even as he contends with powerful and corrupt political elite and with failings of his own office to enforce law.

headline.main: New Afghan Attorney General Seeks Justice in System Rife With Graft
headline.print_headline: New Afghan Attorney General Seeks Justice in System Rife With Graft

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar, Zahra Nader and Fahim Abed contributed reporting.
